00090 DdNode *
00091 Cudd_addNegate(
00092   DdManager * dd,
00093   DdNode * f)
00094 {
00095     DdNode *res;
00096 
00097     do {
00098         res = cuddAddNegateRecur(dd,f);
00099     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00100     return(res);
00101 
00102 } /* end of Cudd_addNegate */
00103 
00104 
00118 DdNode *
00119 Cudd_addRoundOff(
00120   DdManager * dd,
00121   DdNode * f,
00122   int  N)
00123 {
00124     DdNode *res;
00125     double trunc = pow(10.0,(double)N);
00126 
00127     do {
00128         res = cuddAddRoundOffRecur(dd,f,trunc);
00129     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00130     return(res);
00131 
00132 } /* end of Cudd_addRoundOff */

00150 DdNode *
00151 cuddAddNegateRecur(
00152   DdManager * dd,
00153   DdNode * f)
00154 {
00155     DdNode *res,
00156             *fv, *fvn,
00157             *T, *E;
00158 
00159     /* Check terminal cases. */
00160     if (cuddIsConstant(f)) {
00161         res = cuddUniqueConst(dd,-cuddV(f));
00162         return(res);
00163     }
00164 
00165     /* Check cache */
00166     res = cuddCacheLookup1(dd,Cudd_addNegate,f);
00167     if (res != NULL) return(res);
00168 
00169     /* Recursive Step */
00170     fv = cuddT(f);
00171     fvn = cuddE(f);
00172     T = cuddAddNegateRecur(dd,fv);
00173     if (T == NULL) return(NULL);
00174     cuddRef(T);
00175 
00176     E = cuddAddNegateRecur(dd,fvn);
00177     if (E == NULL) {
00178         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,T);
00179         return(NULL);
00180     }
00181     cuddRef(E);
00182     res = (T == E) ? T : cuddUniqueInter(dd,(int)f->index,T,E);
00183     if (res == NULL) {
00184         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00185         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, E);
00186         return(NULL);
00187     }
00188     cuddDeref(T);
00189     cuddDeref(E);
00190 
00191     /* Store result. */
00192     cuddCacheInsert1(dd,Cudd_addNegate,f,res);
00193 
00194     return(res);
00195 
00196 } /* end of cuddAddNegateRecur */
00197

00209 DdNode *
00210 cuddAddRoundOffRecur(
00211   DdManager * dd,
00212   DdNode * f,
00213   double  trunc)
00214 {
00215 
00216     DdNode *res, *fv, *fvn, *T, *E;
00217     double n;
00218     DdNode *(*cacheOp)(DdManager *, DdNode *);
00219   
00220     if (cuddIsConstant(f)) {
00221         n = ceil(cuddV(f)*trunc)/trunc;
00222         res = cuddUniqueConst(dd,n);
00223         return(res);
00224     }
00225     cacheOp = (DdNode *(*)(DdManager *, DdNode *)) Cudd_addRoundOff;
00226     res = cuddCacheLookup1(dd,cacheOp,f);
00227     if (res != NULL) {
00228         return(res);
00229     }
00230     /* Recursive Step */
00231     fv = cuddT(f);
00232     fvn = cuddE(f);
00233     T = cuddAddRoundOffRecur(dd,fv,trunc);
00234     if (T == NULL) {
00235        return(NULL);
00236     }
00237     cuddRef(T);
00238     E = cuddAddRoundOffRecur(dd,fvn,trunc);
00239     if (E == NULL) {
00240         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,T);
00241         return(NULL);
00242     }
00243     cuddRef(E);
00244     res = (T == E) ? T : cuddUniqueInter(dd,(int)f->index,T,E);
00245     if (res == NULL) {
00246         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,T);
00247         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,E);
00248         return(NULL);
00249     }
00250     cuddDeref(T);
00251     cuddDeref(E);
00252 
00253     /* Store result. */
00254     cuddCacheInsert1(dd,cacheOp,f,res);
00255     return(res);
00256   
00257 } /* end of cuddAddRoundOffRecur */
